H0.text: Anemia can be caused by a deficiency of what dietary mineral. Zinc

H1.text: Anemia can be caused by a deficiency of what dietary mineral. Copper

H2.text: Anemia can be caused by a deficiency of what dietary mineral. Magnesium

H3.text: Anemia can be caused by a deficiency of what dietary mineral. Iron

A4.text: Iron-deficiency anemia is anemia caused by a lack of iron.

A5.text: Iron deficiency anemia can be prevented by eating a diet containing sufficient amounts of iron or by iron supplementation.
